column2: Yo Zack, what trainer are you on?
column3: Wow that's so cool. I keep getting stuck...
column4: Seriously?? Of course I want to that sounds so fun! Let me just call my mom give me a sec.

column2: Hey Ding! I'm on Sabrina, she's super hard!
column3: I can help you out if you want. By the way, do you want to hang out at the arcade after school? My mom's driving!
